interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: CURECODE Neuromide Ampoule (30 ml), Concentrated Formula of Active Ingredients, Microbiome Science for Extremely Sensitive & Dry Skin, Repair and Protect Skin Barrier Function, Brightening and Firming for Mature Skin Types Review Date: 2021/01/19 Store: CURECODE Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'CURECODE', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 4.25 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': '40006'} Review Text: I got this CURECODE serum in hopes of introducing more moisture to my dry face (gotta love winter). The very first thing I noticed was that, while there are directions on the box, there are NO instructions on the bottle itself. I'm not in the habit of keeping the packaging (who does that?!).. they need to add the directions onto the bottle label!

The serum itself is pleasing. There was NO scent (THANK YOU!), my sensitive skin had no negative reactions at all and I was pleased with the thickness. It didn't completely absorb into my skin.. I had a few pieces of pillow lint (flannel sheets) stuck to my cheeks the next morning. I can't say how well it works long term yet, but I have high hopes as my skin was more supple the next am. I will update this review if I have any negative reactions. Review Title: Please put the directions on the bottle! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Face Cradle Cover - APPEARUS Massage Fitted Headrest Covers (6 Count/BD1005x6) APPEARUS {'Brand': 'APPEARUS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Machine Wash', 'Package Dimensions': '11.9 x 4.2 x 1.2 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168357655'} I purchased this cover January 17, 2011 when I started massage therapy school. I will also mention that when I made my purchase, it was sold as one cover for $8.50. It is a very long lasting cover! Not only did it survive 7 months of use in school, it has been part of my cover collection used for almost 2 years in my practice. It has been laundered and has held up beautifully - no rips, tears, fading or loss of softness. I am considering purchasing more now as my clientele has grown. With the current offer of $32 for a pack of 6, that makes each cover only a little over $5 each. With the track record the one I already have has, I am more than confident in purchasing more! Lasts and Lasts CURECODE Neuromide Ampoule (30 ml), Concentrated Formula of Active Ingredients, Microbiome Science for Extremely Sensitive & Dry Skin, Repair and Protect Skin Barrier Function, Brightening and Firming for Mature Skin Types CURECODE {'Brand': 'CURECODE', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 4.25 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': '40006'} I got this CURECODE serum in hopes of introducing more moisture to my dry face (gotta love winter). The very first thing I noticed was that, while there are directions on the box, there are NO instructions on the bottle itself. I'm not in the habit of keeping the packaging (who does that?!).. they need to add the directions onto the bottle label!

The serum itself is pleasing. There was NO scent (THANK YOU!), my sensitive skin had no negative reactions at all and I was pleased with the thickness. It didn't completely absorb into my skin.. I had a few pieces of pillow lint (flannel sheets) stuck to my cheeks the next morning. I can't say how well it works long term yet, but I have high hopes as my skin was more supple the next am. I will update this review if I have any negative reactions. Please put the directions on the bottle!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

The user continues to demonstrate a preference for high-quality, durable products in their wellness and therapy practice, such as massage accessories and skincare items. Their recent purchase reflects a growing interest in skincare solutions, particularly for sensitive skin types, indicating a holistic approach to wellness. The user values user-friendly features, as evidenced by their feedback regarding the need for clearer instructions on product packaging. Their experience with sensitive skin shows a tendency to prioritize gentle, non-irritating formulations, further emphasizing their discerning nature in selecting products. 

The user's commitment to professional standards is consistent, as they balance practicality with effective results, mirroring their previous focus on functional accessories for massage therapy. Their rating indicates a thoughtful consideration of product performance, and their openness to potentially long-term benefits suggests a willingness to invest in items that enhance both personal and professional care. Overall, the user leans towards products that offer reliable outcomes while maintaining ease of use, demonstrating a comprehensive and informed approach to their practice and self-care regimen.
